SEARCH
Package org.attribyte.snook.auth

Class PermissionAuthenticator

java.lang.Object
org.attribyte.snook.auth.PermissionAuthenticator
Direct Known Subclasses:
GroupLoginAuthenticator
public abstract class PermissionAuthenticator extends Object
An authenticator that returns permissions based on authentication status.

  • Method Details

    • authenticatedPermission

      protected abstract Set<Permission> authenticatedPermission(String username, String context)
      Gets permissions.
      Parameters:
      username - The authenticated username.
      context - The supplied context.
      Returns:
      The permission.

    • unauthenticatedPermission

      protected Set<Permission> unauthenticatedPermission(String context)
      Gets the permissions for unauthenticated requests. Override to return something other than NONE.
      Parameters:
      context - The context.
      Returns:
      The set of permissions (NONE by default).

    • permission

      public Set<Permission> permission(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, String context)
      Check for an authorized user and return permission.
      Parameters:
      request - The request.
      context - The permission context.
      Returns:
      The set of permissions or an empty set if none.

    • canRead

      Check for an authorized user and if the user has read permission.
      Parameters:
      request - The request.
      context - The permission context.
      Returns:
      Is the use authorized with read permission?
